evidence.text: and the district court entered a preliminary injunction ordering Florida and the United States to dismantle the facility within 60 days because the federal government allegedly failed to prepare an environmental report under the National Environmental Policy Act (NEPA).

extracted.value: 60 days: within 60 days because the federal government allegedly failed to prepare an environmental report under the National Environmental Policy Act (NEPA).
